resources.string: The server response failed. Please try again later.
Password length should be between 8 and 20 characters; must contain at least three of the following: (i) lowercase letters, (ii) uppercase letters, (iii) numeric digit, or (iv) special characters.
Network connection failed, please try again later
The connection was reset, please try again later
Something went wrong, please try again later
Network protocol error, please try again
Network connection timed out, please try again later
Request timed out, please try again
No network, please check the network settings
The environment is too dark, please turn on the flash
To scan the QR code you need to access the “Camera”, please go to “Application Information -> Permissions”!
Access to the album requires access to External Storage, please go to Application Information -> Permissions!
